recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
recipes.description: A rich and gooey chocolate cake with a molten center.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F). Grease ramekins with butter.
Melt chocolate and butter together, stirring until smooth.
Whisk in sugar, eggs, and flour until just combined.
Pour into ramekins and bake for 10-12 minutes.
Serve immediately with vanilla ice cream.

recipes.title: Baklava
recipes.description: A traditional Turkish dessert made of layers of filo pastry, filled with nuts and sweetened with syrup.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Layer filo sheets in a baking dish, brushing each layer with butter.
Sprinkle chopped nuts and cinnamon over every few layers.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until golden.
Make syrup by boiling sugar, water, and honey. Pour over baked baklava and let it soak.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: An Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
instructions: Whisk egg yolks with sugar until thick and pale, then fold in mascarpone.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer them in a dish.
Spread mascarpone mixture over ladyfingers, alternating layers.
Chill for at least 4 hours and dust with cocoa powder before serving.

recipes.title: Turkish Delight
recipes.description: A chewy and sweet Turkish confection flavored with rosewater and dusted with powdered sugar.
instructions: In a pot, mix water, sugar, and lemon juice. Bring to a boil.
Dissolve cornstarch in water and add to the pot, stirring constantly.
Simmer until thick and jelly-like, then add rosewater.
Pour into a dish to set. Once set, cut into squares and dust with powdered sugar.

recipes.title: Red Velvet Cake
recipes.description: A classic red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 175°C (350°F). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
In a large bowl, sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, salt, and cocoa powder.
In another bowl, whisk together the oil, buttermilk, eggs, food coloring, vanilla, and vinegar.
Mix the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients until just combined.
Divide the batter between the prepared pans and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let cakes cool in the pans for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack to cool completely.
Frost with cream cheese frosting before serving.

recipes.title: BBQ Chicken Pizza
recipes.description: A delicious BBQ chicken pizza topped with mozzarella, red onions, and fresh cilantro.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F) and prepare a baking sheet or pizza stone.
Roll out the pizza dough and spread the BBQ sauce evenly over the base.
Sprinkle half of the mozzarella cheese over the BBQ sauce.
Add shredded chicken and red onions on top of the cheese.
Sprinkle the remaining mozzarella cheese over the chicken and onions.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.
Remove from oven and top with fresh cilantro before slicing and serving.

recipes.title: Margarita Pizza
recipes.description: A simple and classic margarita pizza with fresh basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (430°F).
Roll out the pizza dough and place it on a baking tray.
Spread the tomato sauce over the dough.
Top with sliced mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil and bake for 10-12 minutes until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbly.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple and healthy avocado toast with a sprinkle of salt and pepper.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast and sprinkle with red pepper flakes if desired.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Grill the chicken breasts until cooked through and slice them.
In a large bowl, toss the chopped romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top the salad with sliced chicken, croutons, and grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Strawberry Ice Cream
recipes.description: Creamy and refreshing homemade strawberry ice cream.
ingredients: 2 cups fresh strawberries, hulled and chopped
instructions: In a small bowl, mix the chopped strawberries with 1/4 cup of sugar and let sit for 15 minutes until they release their juices.
Mash the strawberries lightly with a fork, leaving some small chunks for texture.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the heavy cream, whole milk, remaining 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla extract, and salt until the sugar is dissolved.
Stir in the strawberries and their juices.
Pour the mixture into an ice cream maker and churn according to the manufacturer's instructions (usually 20-25 minutes).
Transfer the churned ice cream to a container and cover.
Freeze for at least 4 hours or until firm before serving.
Enjoy your homemade strawberry ice cream!

recipes.title: Chicken Shawarma
recipes.description: Juicy and flavorful chicken shawarma with Middle Eastern spices.
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together yogurt, olive oil, garlic, cumin, paprika, turmeric, cinnamon, black pepper, salt, cardamom, and lemon juice to form a marinade.
Add the chicken thighs to the marinade, coating them well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour, or overnight for best results.
Preheat the oven to 425°F (220°C) or heat a grill to medium-high.
Place the marinated chicken on a baking sheet or grill and cook for 20-25 minutes, turning halfway through, until the chicken is cooked through and has a nice char.
Remove the chicken from the heat and let it rest for 5 minutes. Slice into thin strips.
Serve the chicken shawarma in warm pita bread with toppings like lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and a drizzle of garlic sauce or tahini sauce.

recipes.title: Sushi Rolls
recipes.description: Delicious homemade sushi rolls filled with fish and vegetables.
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions.
Place a nori sheet on a bamboo mat and spread rice over it.
Add cucumber, avocado, and fish on top.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce.

recipes.title: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.description: A creamy and savory Russian dish made with tender beef, mushrooms, and onions, served over egg noodles.
instructions: In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat and cook the beef strips until browned. Remove and set aside.
In the same skillet, add the onions and mushrooms, cooking until softened.
Pour in the beef broth and bring to a simmer, scraping up any browned bits from the skillet.
Reduce heat and stir in the sour cream and mustard, mixing until smooth.
Return the beef to the skillet and cook for another 5 minutes or until heated through. Season with salt and pepper.
Serve the beef stroganoff over egg noodles and garnish with fresh parsley.

recipes.title: Veggie Burger
recipes.description: A delicious and healthy burger made with black beans and vegetables.
ingredients: Burger buns and toppings of choice
instructions: Mash the black beans in a bowl and mix in breadcrumbs, carrots, onions, and egg.
Form into patties and cook in a pan until browned on both sides.
Serve on a bun with your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Pho
recipes.description: Traditional Vietnamese noodle soup with beef and aromatic spices.
ingredients: Fresh basil, cilantro, and bean sprouts for garnish
instructions: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Heat beef broth with star anise and cinnamon stick to infuse flavors.
Add noodles and beef slices to the broth.
Top with fresh basil, cilantro, and bean sprouts.

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: A flavorful and aromatic Indian rice dish with marinated chicken, spices, and basmati rice.
ingredients: Whole spices (1 bay leaf, 4 cloves, 1 cinnamon stick, 3 cardamoms)
instructions: Rinse the rice and soak it in water for 30 minutes. Drain and set aside.
In a bowl, marinate the chicken with yogurt, biryani masala, turmeric powder, red chili powder, ginger-garlic paste, and salt. Set aside for 1 hour.
Heat ghee or oil in a large pot. Add the whole spices and sauté until fragrant.
Add the sliced onions and cook until golden brown. Add tomatoes and cook until softened.
Add the marinated chicken and cook until the chicken is half-cooked and the oil separates.
Add the soaked rice, fresh coriander, and mint leaves. Pour in 2 cups of water, cover, and cook on low heat until the rice and chicken are fully cooked.
Serve the biryani hot, garnished with extra coriander and mint if desired.

recipes.title: Basbousa
recipes.description: A sweet semolina cake soaked in syrup, often flavored with coconut or rosewater.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Grease a baking dish.
In a bowl, mix semolina, sugar, yogurt, melted butter, coconut, baking powder, and vanilla extract.
Pour the mixture into the baking dish and smooth the top.
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden.
Meanwhile, make the syrup: Combine sugar, water, and lemon juice in a saucepan. Bring to a boil, then simmer until slightly thickened. Add rosewater if desired.
Pour the syrup over the hot cake and let it soak in before serving.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers stuffed with seasoned ground beef and rice.
instructions: Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds.
Cook ground beef with onions, then mix with rice and tomato sauce.
Stuff peppers with the beef mixture.
Bake at 180°C for 25-30 minutes.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate.
Top with basil leaves and drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with grilled chicken, Parmesan cheese, and garlic.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions, then drain.
In a pan, melt butter and cook the chicken slices until golden and cooked through. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add garlic and sauté until fragrant. Pour in the heavy cream and bring to a simmer.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and creamy. Season with salt and pepper.
Add the cooked pasta and chicken to the sauce, tossing to combine.
Serve warm, garnished with chopped parsley.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: Baked eggplant slices with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Arrange eggplant slices on a baking sheet and bake at 180°C for 15 minutes.
Layer eggplant, marinara sauce, and cheese in a baking dish.
Bake for another 20 minutes until cheese is melted.
Top with fresh basil.

recipes.title: Shakshuka
recipes.description: North African dish with poached eggs in a spicy tomato sauce.
instructions: Cook onions and bell pepper until soft.
Add tomatoes and season with cumin, salt, and pepper.
Make small wells and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set.

recipes.title: Chicken Parmesan
recipes.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
instructions: Bread and fry the chicken breasts until golden.
Top with marinara sauce and cheeses.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes until cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Ratatouille
recipes.description: French vegetable dish with eggplant, zucchini, and tomatoes.
instructions: Layer vegetables in a baking dish, drizzling with olive oil.
Season with salt, pepper, and thyme.
Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Falafel
recipes.description: Crispy chickpea balls served with pita bread and tahini sauce.
instructions: Blend chickpeas, parsley, onion, and garlic until smooth.
Form into small balls and fry until golden.
Serve in pita bread with tahini sauce.

recipes.title: BBQ Ribs
recipes.description: Slow-cooked pork ribs with barbecue sauce.
instructions: Season ribs with salt, pepper, and garlic powder.
Cook in the oven at 150°C for 2 hours.
Brush with barbecue sauce and bake for another 30 minutes.

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.description: Classic French toast topped with syrup and fresh fruit.
ingredients: Maple syrup and fresh fruit for serving
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, and cinnamon together.
Dip bread in the egg mixture and cook in a pan until golden on each side.
Serve with syrup and fruit.

recipes.title: Gazpacho
recipes.description: Cold Spanish tomato soup with cucumbers and bell peppers.
instructions: Blend tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, and olive oil until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Chill in the fridge for 1 hour before serving.

recipes.title: Kimchi Fried Rice
recipes.description: Korean fried rice with kimchi, rice, and egg.
instructions: Cook kimchi in a pan until slightly caramelized.
Add rice and soy sauce, stirring to combine.
Top with a fried egg and green onions.

recipes.title: Tuna Poke Bowl
recipes.description: Hawaiian bowl with fresh tuna, rice, and vegetables.
ingredients: Soy sauce and sesame oil for dressing
instructions: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions.
Arrange rice in a bowl with tuna, avocado, and cucumber.
Drizzle with soy sauce and sesame oil.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Fresh salad with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
ingredients: Olive oil and vinegar for dressing
instructions: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and vinegar.
Toss to combine and serve.

recipes.title: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Classic shrimp scampi in a garlic butter sauce served with pasta.
instructions: Melt butter in a pan and add garlic.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Pour in white wine and simmer for 3 minutes.
Serve over pasta.

recipes.title: Quiche Lorraine
recipes.description: Savory pie with a creamy custard filling of bacon and cheese.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Whisk eggs and cream together.
Pour into pie crust and add bacon and cheese.
Bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.title: Beef Bourguignon
recipes.description: French beef stew braised in red wine with mushrooms and onions.
instructions: Brown beef in a pot.
Add wine, broth, mushrooms, and onions.
Simmer for 2 hours until tender.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Indian chicken curry in a rich tomato and butter sauce.
instructions: Cook chicken in a pan until browned.
Add tomato puree, cream, and spices.
Simmer for 15 minutes, adding butter at the end.

recipes.title: Hummus
recipes.description: Middle Eastern dip made from blended chickpeas, tahini, and lemon.
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.
Serve with pita bread or veggies.

recipes.title: Clam Chowder
recipes.description: Creamy soup with clams, potatoes, and celery.
instructions: Cook potatoes, celery, and onions until tender.
Add clams and juice, then cream.
Simmer for 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Gumbo
recipes.description: Louisiana-style stew with sausage, shrimp, and vegetables.
instructions: Brown sausage in a pot, then add shrimp.
Add vegetables and chicken broth.
Simmer until thickened.

recipes.title: Lasagna
recipes.description: Layered pasta dish with meat, ricotta, and mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Layer noodles, ricotta, mozzarella, and meat sauce in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and top with Parmesan.
Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Peking Duck
recipes.description: Chinese-style roast duck with crispy skin served with pancakes.
ingredients: Pancakes and hoisin sauce for serving
instructions: Brush duck with honey and soy sauce.
Roast at 200°C for 1 hour until crispy.
Serve with pancakes and hoisin sauce.

recipes.title: Baked Ziti
recipes.description: Italian pasta bake with marinara sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella.
instructions: Cook pasta and mix with marinara sauce and ricotta.
Place in a baking dish and top with mozzarella and Parmesan.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Chicken Katsu
recipes.description: Japanese-style breaded chicken cutlet served with tonkatsu sauce.
instructions: Coat chicken in flour, egg, and panko breadcrumbs.
Fry until golden and serve with tonkatsu sauce.

recipes.title: Croissant
recipes.description: Flaky, buttery French pastry.
instructions: Make dough and layer with butter.
Fold and roll dough several times.
Shape into croissants and bake at 200°C for 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Miso Soup
recipes.description: Traditional Japanese soup with tofu, seaweed, and miso paste.
instructions: Heat dashi broth and dissolve miso paste in it.
Add tofu and seaweed, and simmer briefly.
Serve topped with green onions.

recipes.title: Thai Green Curry
recipes.description: Spicy green curry with chicken, coconut milk, and vegetables.
instructions: Cook chicken with green curry paste in a pan.
Add coconut milk and vegetables.
Simmer for 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Crepes
recipes.description: Thin French pancakes served with various sweet or savory fillings.
instructions: Whisk all ingredients until smooth.
Cook in a non-stick pan, flipping once.
Serve with desired toppings.

recipes.title: African Peanut Stew
recipes.description: A rich and creamy stew with vegetables and peanut flavor.
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add the onion, garlic, and ginger and sauté until soft.
Add the bell pepper and sweet potato, cooking for a few minutes until they start to soften.
Stir in the tomato sauce and peanut butter, mixing until smooth.
Pour in the broth and bring to a simmer. Cook until sweet potatoes are tender, about 15-20 minutes.
Add chickpeas and spinach, cooking until spinach wilts. Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving. Serve hot.

recipes.title: Moroccan Lamb Tagine
recipes.description: Slow-cooked lamb with spices, apricots, and vegetables.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot or tagine over medium heat. Add the lamb and brown on all sides.
Remove lamb from the pot and set aside. In the same pot, add onion and garlic, cooking until softened.
Stir in the cumin, cinnamon, ginger, and turmeric, cooking for about 1 minute until fragrant.
Return lamb to the pot, then add apricots, chickpeas, and broth. Season with salt and pepper.
Bring to a simmer, then cover and cook on low heat for 1.5 to 2 hours, until lamb is tender.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving. Serve hot with couscous or rice.

recipes.title: Couscous Salad
recipes.description: Light couscous salad with vegetables and a lemon dressing.
ingredients: Lemon juice and olive oil for dressing
instructions: Prepare couscous according to package instructions.
Combine with vegetables and drizzle with dressing.
Toss to mix and serve.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Grilled fish tacos with fresh salsa and lime.
instructions: Grill fish until cooked through.
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, and salsa.
Serve with lime wedges.

recipes.title: Stuffed Shells
recipes.description: Baked pasta shells stuffed with ricotta, spinach, and marinara sauce.
instructions: Cook pasta shells according to package instructions.
Combine ricotta and spinach, and stuff the shells.
Place stuffed shells in a baking dish, cover with marinara sauce and mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes until cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Vegetable Pot Pie
recipes.description: Comforting pot pie with a creamy vegetable filling.
instructions: Cook carrots, peas, and potatoes in a pan with cream until tender.
Transfer to a baking dish and cover with puff pastry.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes until golden.

recipes.title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
recipes.description: Zucchini filled with ground turkey, tomatoes, and cheese.
instructions: Cook turkey in a pan and mix with tomatoes.
Fill zucchini halves with the mixture and top with cheese.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes until cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Baked Salmon with Herbs
recipes.description: Oven-baked salmon fillet with a blend of fresh herbs.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Rub salmon with olive oil, dill, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until cooked through.
Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Roasted Vegetable Salad
recipes.description: Mixed roasted vegetables with balsamic vinaigrette.
instructions: Toss vegetables in olive oil and roast at 200°C for 20 minutes.
Drizzle with balsamic vinegar and serve.

recipes.title: Classic Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan.
instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing and croutons.
Top with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Corn Chowder
recipes.description: Hearty and creamy corn soup with potatoes and bacon.
instructions: Cook bacon in a pot until crispy, then add corn and potatoes.
Pour in cream and simmer until potatoes are tender.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
recipes.description: Button mushrooms filled with a savory breadcrumb and herb mixture.
instructions: Mix breadcrumbs, Parmesan, and parsley.
Stuff mushrooms with the mixture and bake at 180°C for 15 minutes.

recipes.title: Baked Brie with Cranberries
recipes.description: Warm and gooey brie topped with cranberry sauce, perfect for appetizers.
instructions: Top brie with cranberry sauce.
Bake at 180°C for 10 minutes until gooey.
Serve with crackers.

recipes.title: Vegetable Quesadillas
recipes.description: Cheesy quesadillas filled with bell peppers, onions, and zucchini.
instructions: Place cheese and vegetables on one tortilla, then top with the other tortilla.
Cook in a pan until cheese is melted and tortilla is golden.
Slice and serve.
